sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.css'], }) export class ContentComponent { @Input() title: string = ''; items = [ { image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+1', alt: 'Slide 1' }, { image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+2', alt: 'Slide 2' }, { image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+3', alt: 'Slide 3' }, ]; currentIndex = 0; next(): void { this.currentIndex = (this.currentIndex + 1) % this.items.length; } prev(): void { this.currentIndex = (this.currentIndex - 1 + this.items.length) % this.items.length; } }

Generate Synthetic Data for Free

Start creating high-quality synthetic datasets with ease. Upload your models or configurations and get datasets tailored to your Machine Learning projects. No hidden fees or monthly charges—just pure data.

What's included

  • Unlimited data generation

  • Flexible output formats (CSV, JSON)

  • Ready-to-use datasets for ML

  • Community support

Free

$0/mo

Unlimited Access

Upload Instructions

Easy Steps / 4 steps

Follow these instructions to upload and process your 3D model effectively.

  • Step 1: Register an account or log in to your existing account to start uploading models.
  • Step 2: Upload your 3D model in supported formats: .fbx, .obj, .gltf, etc.
  • Step 3: Wait for the success notification confirming your file upload.
  • Step 4: Download your processed data in .zip format, including images and metadata.

Output Data

Replicated Details

The uploaded 3D object will be replicated across multiple backgrounds, tested in various scenarios, and combined with other objects for classifier evaluation.

  • Your 3D object will be replicated across different backgrounds.
  • Multiple replicas will be generated on the same background.
  • Combined objects for classifier testing.

FORMATS

/ Allowed formats
.OBJ
.USDZ
.FBX
.STL
.GLB
.GLTF
.DAE
.3DS
.PLY
